revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C8 |revision=v2.x |series=AC1750 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/01/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG2172B |manuf_rev=-2.0 Rev1.0 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C8V2 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/?categoryid=2872&model=Archer+C8 Product page]
"1412172B-2.0 Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2826710 FCC photos].
